alert.note: Alert for Cedar (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 6:59PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Cedar County through 730 PM CDT... At 658 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hartington, moving northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Fordyce around 710 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include St. Helena. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
